title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, fry the pancetta in a pan until crisp.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and mix in the grated cheeses.
Drain the pasta, reserving some of the pasta water.
Quickly mix the hot pasta with the pancetta, then stir in the egg and cheese mixture.
Add a little pasta water if needed to create a creamy sauce. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: In a bowl, combine yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, paprika, garam masala, ginger, and garlic.
Add the chicken chunks and marinate for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Add the chopped onion and cook until softened.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes.
Reduce the heat to low and stir in the heavy cream. Simmer for another 5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
